about_the_game:
Add rings, logos and T-shirts representing legendary Japanese pro-wrestler and MMA combatant Yoshihiro Takayama with this Edit Part DLC.

[CONTENTS]
Custom Ring - TAKAYAMANIA-EMPIRE
Custom Ring - TAKAYAMANIA
Promotion/Stable Logo - TAKAYAMANIA
Wrestler Edit Parts - Chest (Four T-shirt logos)

All Spike Chunsoft revenue will be donated to TAKAYAMANIA, a foundation established to help support Mr. Takayama and his family.
Mr. Takayama was paralyzed from the neck down from a wrestling accident during a match on May 4, 2017.
